plot: The arrival of a baby on the scene, thanks to Mustang Pete's interference, throws a monkey wrench into Slippery Slim's and Sophie Clutts' wedding plans.
title: Slippery Slim and the Stork
plot_es: The arrival of a baby on the scene, thanks to Mustang Pete's interference, throws a monkey wrench into Slippery Slim's and Sophie Clutts' wedding plans.
plot_en: The arrival of a baby on the scene, thanks to Mustang Pete's interference, throws a monkey wrench into Slippery Slim's and Sophie Clutts' wedding plans.
